instructions.ar: انعطف يساراً قليلاً لتبقى على Shibuya Crossing
instructions.da: Drej let til venstre vid Shibuya Crossing
instructions.de: Leicht links weiter an Shibuya Crossing
instructions.en: Make a slight left at Shibuya Crossing
instructions.eo: Turniĝu ete maldekstren al Shibuya Crossing
instructions.es: Dobla levemente a la izquierda en Shibuya Crossing
instructions.es-ES: Doble levemente a la izquierda en Shibuya Crossing
instructions.fi: Jatka loivasti vasempaan tielle Shibuya Crossing
instructions.fr: Tourner légèrement à gauche à Shibuya Crossing
instructions.he: פנה קלות שמאלה כדי להישאר על Shibuya Crossing
instructions.hu: Forduljon enyhén balra az Shibuya Crossing
instructions.id: Make a slight left at Shibuya Crossing
instructions.it: Fai una leggera curva a sinistra al Shibuya Crossing
instructions.my: Shibuya Crossingပေါ်တွင်နေရန် ဘယ်ဘက်အနည်းငယ်ကွေ့ပါ
instructions.no: Sving svakt til venstre i Shibuya Crossing
instructions.pl: Skręć w lewo w łagodny zakręt na Shibuya Crossing
instructions.pt-BR: Faça uma curva suave a esquerda em Shibuya Crossing
instructions.pt-PT: Vire ligeiramente à esquerda em Shibuya Crossing
instructions.ro: Virați ușor la stânga la Shibuya Crossing
instructions.ru: Плавно поверните налево на Shibuya Crossing
instructions.sl: Zavijte rahlo levo na Shibuya Crossing
instructions.tr: Shibuya Crossing konumunda sola hafif dönüş yap
instructions.uk: Поверніть плавно ліворуч щоб залишитись на Shibuya Crossing
instructions.vi: Nghiêng về bên trái ở Shibuya Crossing
instructions.yo: Ṣe diẹ osi ni Shibuya Crossing
instructions.zh-Hans: Make a slight left at Shibuya Crossing
